thread.title: A Class apart - the role of special schools in our region | Anglia
thread.title_full: A Class apart - the role of special schools in our region | Anglia - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: A Class apart - the role of special schools in our region | Anglia
text:
Play video A video report by Kate Prout
All this week we're looking at the role of special schools in our region - particularly in Norfolk where they outshine mainstream in all Ofsted inspections. We'll be asking if there's still a place for special education and whether we're making enough provision for the future.
Last updated Tue 7 Feb 2017
